Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Teachers can give feedback tailored to how you understand lessons. GenAI is very surface level when it comes to learning.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Teachers can give feedback tailored to how or what is your intended purpose and they can help develop the ideas for what you intend. GenAI is very surface level when it comes to feedback.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Writing an essay a year ago, GenAI said it was ok and not much changes was needed but my teacher gave a very different feedback, I was told to fix the analysis and interpretations of the literary work.
